Package api.backend_app.services

Class AppointmentService

java.lang.Object
api.backend_app.services.AppointmentService
@Service public class AppointmentService extends Object
This Service deals with methods specific to the `appointment` entity

    • createAppointment

      public void createAppointment(AppointmentDTO appointmentDTO) throws Exception
      Create a new appointment with the given details
      Parameters:
      appointmentDTO - the details of the new facility
      Throws:
      Exception - if any o the details are invalid or if it couldn't access the DB

    • findAppointmentByUsername

      public List<AppointmentDTO> findAppointmentByUsername(String username) throws Exception
      Retrieve all appointments for a specific user
      Parameters:
      username - the username of the pet owner
      Returns:
      a list with all appointments of that user
      Throws:
      Exception - if there is any problem with the DB connection

    • findAppointmentByFacility

      public List<AppointmentDTO> findAppointmentByFacility(String facilityId) throws Exception
      Retrieve all appointments for a specific facility id
      Parameters:
      facilityId - the id of the facility we are looking for
      Returns:
      a list with all appointments of that facility
      Throws:
      Exception - if there is any problem with the DB connection

    • changeAppointmentState

      public AppointmentDTO changeAppointmentState(AppointmentDTO appointmentDTO) throws Exception
      Change the state of a given appointment
      Parameters:
      appointmentDTO - the appointment whose state has to be changed
      Returns:
      the appointment with a new state
      Throws:
      Exception - if the appointment details are invalid or the DB couldn't be accessed
